EmailTemplate.subject: AERO Patent Watch - March 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Email Title March 2015
Please find a link to the Aero Patent Watch – March 2015 <http://goaero.honeywell.com/JI2qQv0h3X0ZeKR0G600060>. The Aero Patent Watch provides a monthly view of published or granted patents by the U.S. Patent and Trademark office by Honeywell or peer companies in our area of interest (Direct Link to Patents by Assignee <http://goaero.honeywell.com/ZIZ6603fG0000v0Ri20qXQK>).
As new issues are released, prior issues are moved to the Archive <http://goaero.honeywell.com/MZ0X0v0RQK63G00gq06I0j2> section. Additional Aero IP processes and background information is available at the Aero IP Community Wiki. <http://goaero.honeywell.com/z0vR2Gq0006IZkK3Q6h0X00>
If you have any questions, please let me know.
Thank you, Dan Dan Gutfreund IP Process Leader Aerospace, Advanced Technology, Technology Strategy 21111 N 19th Ave (M/S 2J35A5) Phoenix, AZ 85027 Phone: +1 602 436-9030 Mobile: +1 480 258-8692 Dan.Gutfreund@Honeywell.com <http://goaero.honeywell.com/a0200q01vQ0R00hXFIZr66G> Privacy Statement <http://honeywell.com/Privacy> Terms & Conditions <http://honeywell.com/Pages/TermsConditions.aspx> © 2015 Honeywell International Inc. <http://www.honeywell.com>
